Nov PERIOD 

Intoxicated Person at the Astronomy Building

Campus Police responded to an incident involving an intoxicated person that was reported at  a.m PERIOD According to a Campus Police report the incident ended at  a.m PERIOD



Nov PERIOD 

Criminal Property Damage Graffiti at the Hawaii Institute of Geophysics

Maintenance cleaned up graffiti found at the Hawaii Institute of Geophysics PERIOD The graffiti was reported to Campus Police at  p.m PERIOD This case has been referred to maintenance PERIOD

Disruptive Behavior Trespass Warning at the Music Building

A party reported an incident of disruptive behavior to Campus Police at  a.m PERIOD The incident lasted until  a.m PERIOD Campus Police later issued a trespass warning to the suspect PERIOD

Attempted Moped Theft at Hale Wainani

Thieves attempted to steal a moped at Hale Wainani between  and  p.m PERIOD The reporting party witnessed the event PERIOD This case is pending further investigation PERIOD



Nov PERIOD 

Assault III at Hale Noelani

An assault occurred at Hale Noelani between Nov PERIOD  at  p.m PERIOD and Nov PERIOD  at  a.m PERIOD The incident was reported to Campus Police thereafter PERIOD This case has been referred to HPD PERIOD

Criminal Property Damage at Speech Pathology

Campus Police received a report of criminal property damage at Speech Pathology PERIOD The incident occurred at  a.m PERIOD



Nov PERIOD 

Theft of Services at the Biomedical Sciences Building

The incident occurred between  and  a.m PERIOD Campus Police received a call of the incident immediately thereafter PERIOD



Nov PERIOD 

Security Observations Safety Hazard at Hale Aloha Mokihana

Campus Police observed a safety hazard at Hale Aloha Mokihana at  a.m PERIOD This case has been referred to Student Housing PERIOD

Bike Theft at Athletics Complex

Thieves stole a bike from the Athletics Complex between  and  p.m PERIOD The incident was reported to Campus Police at  p.m PERIOD
